name: Departed (SnappishStew)
description:
• : This game is a passion project. It was advertised and promoted by Meriam Touati and developed by Giacomo Mazza. You can have a chat with us here - Twitter: Meriam & Giacomo. Instagram: Meriam & Giacomo.
  • When will Departed be fully ready? The deadline for the project is the 15th September 2019.

Thank you for downloading the project. Visit us on Instagram and Twitter to know more about the game.
